channel.title: [317] Thieving giving multiple items
channel.description: I was wondering how in a Delta source I could make thieving something give you one of like several items. Example: If I pick pocketed a hero I get a rune platebody or a mithril 2h.

item.title: [317] Thieving giving multiple items
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

use Misc.random(5)==1
and make it add items during a certain chance

you can add as many additem as you want in

something like this

public void Gift() { int gift = misc.random(80); if(gift >= 0 && gift <= 18) { addItem(6856, 1); addItem(6857, 1); } else if(gift >= 19 && gift <= 38) { addItem(6858, 1); addItem(6859, 1); } else if(gift >= 39 && gift <= 58) { addItem(6860, 1); addItem(6861, 1); } else if(gift >= 59 && gift <= 78) { addItem(6862, 1); addItem(6863, 1); } else { addItem(962, 1); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Thieving giving multiple items
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

[quote=“gavman9966, post:2, topic:360491”]go to npchandeler.java or what ever and you search for like additem or somthing and add

temp.additem(itemid, amout);[/quote]
I can tell you straight away that will not work.
